alert.note: Alert for Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 12:50PM EST until January 15 at 12:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two to three inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 PM EST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
